Most 사후아긴 feature green coloration, darker along the back and lighter on the belly. Many have dark stripes, bands, or 감지, but these tend to fade with 나이. An adult male 사후아긴 stands roughly 6 feet tall and weighs about 200 pounds.

사후아긴 are the natural enemy of aquatic 엘프. The two cannot coexist peacefully: Wars between them are prolonged, bloody affairs that sometimes interfere with shipping and maritime trade. 사후아긴 have an only slightly less vehement hatred for 해신.

사후아긴 말하기 their own language, 사후아긴. Thanks to their high 지능 scores, most 사후아긴 also 말하기 two 보너스 languages, usually Common and Aquan.

COMBAT

사후아긴 are savage 전사, asking for and giving no quarter. When swimming, a 사후아긴 tears with its feet as it strikes with its talons or a weapon. About half of any group of 사후아긴 are also armed with nets.

Blindsense (Ex): A 사후아긴 can 생명체 위치파악 underwater within a 30-foot radius. This ability works only when the 사후아긴 is underwater.

Rake (Ex): 공격 보너스 +2 melee, 피해 1d4+1. A 사후아긴 also gains two rake 공격 when it 공격 while swimming.

Freshwater Sensitivity (Ex): A 사후아긴 fully immersed in fresh water must succeed on a DC 15 Fortitude save or become fatigued. Even on a success, it must repeat the save attempt every 10 minutes it remains immersed.

빛 Blindness (Ex): Abrupt exposure to bright 빛(such as sunlight or a 햇살 spell) blinds 사후아긴 for round. On subsequent rounds, they are dazzled while operating in bright 빛.

말하기 with 상어(Ex): 사후아긴 can communicate telepathically with 상어 up to 150 feet away. The communication is limited to fairly simple concepts such as “food,” “danger,” and “enemy.” 사후아긴 can use 동물 조련 skill to befriend and train 상어.

Water Dependent (Ex): 사후아긴 can survive out of the water for 1 hour per 2 points of 건강(after that, refer to 숨참기 rules on page 304 of the Dungeon Master 의 Guide).

스킬: A 사후아긴 has a +8 racial 보너스 on any 수영 check to 공연 some special action or avoid a hazard. It can always choose to take 10 on a 수영 check, even if distracted or endangered. It can use 달리기 action while swimming, provided it 수영 in a straight line.

*Underwater, a 사후아긴 has a +4 racial 보너스 on 숨기, 듣기, and 감지 checks.

*A 사후아긴 has a +4 racial 보너스 on 생존 and 전문직(hunter) checks within 50 miles of its home.

*A 사후아긴 has a +4 racial 보너스 on 동물 조련 checks when working with 상어.

About one in two hundred 사후아긴 has four arms. Such creatures can make four claw 공격 or use extra 무기, in addition to the claw and bite 공격.

If a community of aquatic 엘프 is located within 100 miles of a 사후아긴 community, about one in one hundred 사후아긴 looks just like an 물의 엘프. These creatures, called malenti, have a 수영 속도 of 40 feet, can remain out of water for 1 hour per point of 건강, and have freshwater sensitivity and 빛 sensitivity (dazzled in bright 빛). Malenti have no natural 공격. They are otherwise identical with 사후아긴.
